articles.description: After reports related Rayudu's tweet with Gavaskar's "no fielding, no runs" comments, the former came up with a hard-hitting tweet to end the speculation. | Cricket
articles.content: Ambati Rayudu and social media are an interesting match. They don't meet that often but whenever they do, sparks fly on most occasions. There are not many Indian cricket fans who are unaware of Rayud… [+2322 chars]

articles.title: WTA Madrid Day 5 Predictions Including Coco Gauff vs Paula Badosa - Last Word On Sports
articles.description: Day 5 of the 2023 WTA Madrid Open includes eight interesting third round singles matches on Saturday, featuring Sabalenka, Garcia and Gauff.
articles.content: Day 5 of the 2023 WTA Madrid Open features eight interesting third round singles matches on Saturday. Aryna Sabalenka, Caroline Garcia, Coco Gauff and Maria Sakkari will all be in action at the year’… [+3476 chars]
